TextLibrary.Text: You have failed to defeat the monster.
You have succeeded in obtaining the Elvenstone. Now return to Ylarie to bless the wolves homeland.
Winter rewards you for blessing the homeland of the wolves. Winter also becomes your companion.
You must first go to Ehlariel to request the Elvenstone from Queen Ehlanna.
You must now return to Ylarie to bless the homeland of the wolves.
